SOLUTIONS.TITLE: Our Solutions
SOLUTIONS.SUBTITLE: What we do
SOLUTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Explore our custom digital solutions that turn your ideas into game-changing results.

website-engineering.TITLE: Website Engineering
website-engineering.DESCRIPTION: We create high-performance websites tailored to your brand, offering seamless experiences, modern design, and scalable solutions.

app-development.TITLE: Custom Platform Solutions
app-development.DESCRIPTION: We create robust and secure platforms, including SaaS products and management systems, all customized to meet your unique business needs.

mobile-development.TITLE: Mobile Development
mobile-development.DESCRIPTION: We design and develop intuitive, feature-rich mobile apps for iOS and Android, combining sleek design with seamless functionality.

ai-integration.TITLE: AI-Powered Apps
ai-integration.DESCRIPTION: We integrate cutting-edge artificial intelligence into digital products to enhance user experiences and optimize business operations.

ui-ux-design.TITLE: UI/UX Design
ui-ux-design.DESCRIPTION: We craft user-centric, intuitive interfaces that drive engagement, improve usability, and deliver visually compelling digital experiences.

inception-team.TITLE: Inception Team
inception-team.DESCRIPTION: Our developers and business strategists align innovation with your business goals to deliver market-ready solutions.

WHY_US.SUBTITLE: WHY US?
WHY_US.TITLE: The Synopp Advantage
WHY_US.DESCRIPTION: Discover the core strengths that make us the perfect partner for your digital journey.

agility.TITLE: Agility and Flexibility
agility.DESCRIPTION: Thriving in fast-paced environments, adapting to changing needs, delivering results without compromising quality.

client-centric.TITLE: Client-Centric Approach
client-centric.DESCRIPTION: Tailored solutions for your unique business challenges, goals, and audience, ensuring the best-fit technology for your needs.

expertise.TITLE: Interdisciplinary Expertise
expertise.DESCRIPTION: A blend of developers, strategists, and designers ensures technical excellence and strategic business value.

commitment.TITLE: Client Commitment
commitment.DESCRIPTION: Fostering long-term partnerships through transparency, collaboration, and goal alignment.

technology.TITLE: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.DESCRIPTION: Leveraging the latest tech—AI, machine learning, cloud, and mobile—to drive innovation and scalable growth.

results.TITLE: Results-Driven Focus
results.DESCRIPTION: Delivering measurable outcomes aligned with your business goals, ensuring tangible impact and long-term growth.

OUR_PROCESS.SUBTITLE: OUR PROCESS
OUR_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: We deliver excellence through our proven process.

discovery.TITLE: Discovery
discovery.DESCRIPTION: We start by fully understanding your goals, challenges, and vision to create a strong, shared foundation.

design.TITLE: Design
design.DESCRIPTION: Our design team crafts intuitive, user-centric interfaces that align with your brand and enhance user experience.

develop.TITLE: Develop
develop.DESCRIPTION: We build your solution using the latest technologies, ensuring scalability, security, and top-tier performance.

launch.TITLE: Launch
launch.DESCRIPTION: We rigorously test, refine, and launch your product, ensuring it's fully optimized for success from day one.

TECH_STACK.SUBTITLE: THE STACK WE USE
TECH_STACK.TITLE: Transforming ideas with the right technologies.
TECH_STACK.DESCRIPTION: We use the latest tools and platforms to build reliable, scalable solutions that bring your vision to life.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE.TITLE: Message Sent!
SUCCESS_MESSAGE.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for reaching out. Our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

PROCESS_STEPS.TITLE: What happens when you book a call?
PROCESS_STEPS.DESCRIPTION: When you reach out, you get all eyes on your project. We carefully study your request to make sure we fully understand the scope.

STEP_1.TITLE: Our team receives your requirements
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: When you reach out, you get all eyes on your project. We carefully study your request to make sure we fully understand the scope.

STEP_2.TITLE: Discuss Your Needs
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: In order to learn more about your business and the challenges you face, we'll schedule a call. Our experts will dive deep into your goals and deliver actionable insights to craft the perfect solution for you.

STEP_3.TITLE: Get A Tailored Proposal
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: We'll send you a custom proposal with a clear plan, budget, and timeline—aligned with your needs.

COOKIE_MODAL.TITLE: Our website uses cookies
COOKIE_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: We use cookies to improve your experience on this website. You may choose which types of cookies to allow and change your preferences at any time.
COOKIE_MODAL.DESCRIPTION_PREFERENCES: We use cookies to improve your experience on this website. You may choose which types of cookies to allow and change your preferences at any time. Disabling cookies may impact your experience on this website
COOKIE_MODAL.ESSENTIAL_DESCRIPTION: Cookies required to enable basic website functionality.
COOKIE_MODAL.ANALYTICS_DESCRIPTION: Cookies used to understand how the website is being used.

COOKIE_POLICY.TITLE: Cookie Policy
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_1_INTRO: This Cookie Policy explains how Synopp ("we", "our", or "us") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our website
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_1_CONSENT: By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_1_DISAGREE: If you do not agree, you must adjust your browser settings to reject cookies or refrain from using our site.
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_2_CONTENT: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, smartphone, or tablet) when you visit a website. They help the site remember your preferences, improve performance, and deliver tailored content.
COOKIE_POLICY.ESSENTIAL_COOKIES_PURPOSE: Required for the website to function (e.g., login, security, payment processing).
COOKIE_POLICY.ANALYTICS_COOKIES_PURPOSE: Collect anonymous data on site usage (e.g., Google Analytics) to improve performance.
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_4_INTRO: We partner with services (e.g., Google, Facebook) that may set cookies for:
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_4_PRIVACY_NOTICE: These third parties handle data per their own privacy policies.
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_5_INTRO: You can control or disable cookies through:
COOKIE_POLICY.BROWSER_SETTINGS_CONTENT: Adjust preferences in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, etc. (Note: Disabling cookies may limit site functionality).
COOKIE_POLICY.CONSENT_TOOLS_CONTENT: Use our cookie banner to opt in/out of non-essential cookies.
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_6_CONTENT: We may update this policy to reflect legal or operational changes. Significant updates will be notified via email or a website banner.
COOKIE_POLICY.SECTION_7_INTRO: For questions about this Cookie Policy, email

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_1_CONTENT: At Synopp, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your personal data when you visit our website and will explain your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_2_INTRO: Synopp is the data controller for the personal data you provide through this website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_3_INTRO: We may collect, use, store, and transfer different types of personal data about you, which we have grouped as follows:
PRIVACY_POLICY.TECHNICAL_DATA_CONTENT: IP address, browser type and version, time zone settings, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system, and platform.
PRIVACY_POLICY.USAGE_DATA_CONTENT: Information about how you use our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.MARKETING_DATA_CONTENT: Your preferences for receiving marketing communications.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_4_TITLE: 4. How We Collect Your Personal Data
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_4_INTRO: We use different methods to collect data about you, including:
PRIVACY_POLICY.DIRECT_INTERACTION_CONTENT: When you fill out forms or communicate with us.
PRIVACY_POLICY.AUTOMATED_TECH_CONTENT: When you browse our website, we may automatically collect technical data about your device and browsing actions using cookies and similar technologies.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_5_INTRO: We only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
PRIVACY_POLICY.PURPOSE_1: To perform a contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PURPOSE_2: When necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your fundamental rights do not override those interests.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PURPOSE_3: To comply with a legal or regulatory obligation.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PURPOSE_4: When you have given us consent to process your personal data for a specific purpose.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_6_INTRO: Under the GDPR, you have several rights regarding your personal data:
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_ACCESS_CONTENT: You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_RECTIFICATION_CONTENT: You can request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete information.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_ERASURE_CONTENT: You can request the deletion of your personal data under certain conditions.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_RESTRICT_CONTENT: You can request that we limit the processing of your personal data under certain conditions.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_PORTABILITY_CONTENT: You can request the transfer of your data to another organization or directly to you under certain conditions.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_OBJECT_CONTENT: You can object to our processing of your personal data under certain conditions.
PRIVACY_POLICY.EXERCISE_RIGHTS_1: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_7_CONTENT_1: We use cookies and similar technologies to distinguish you from other users of our website. This helps us provide you with a good browsing experience and allows us to improve our site.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_7_CONTENT_2: You can set your browser to refuse all or some cookies, or to alert you when websites set or access cookies. If you disable or reject cookies, please note that some parts of this website may become inaccessible or not function properly.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_7_CONTENT_3_A: For more information about the cookies we use, please see our
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_8_CONTENT: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page. If the changes are significant, we will also notify you by email. We recommend that you review this privacy policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your data.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_9_INTRO: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
PRIVACY_POLICY.COMPLAINT_RIGHT: You also have the right to lodge a complaint at any time with The Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés (CNIL).

TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.TITLE: Terms & Conditions
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_1_CONTENT: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of the website operated by Synopp ("we", "our", or "us"). By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not access the website.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.CLIENT_DEFINITION: Any person who contracts our services.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.CONTENT_DEFINITION: Any information, text, graphics, or other materials uploaded, downloaded, or appearing on the website.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SERVICES_DEFINITION: All services provided by Synopp to its clients.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.USER_DEFINITION: Any person who browses, reads, views, comments, or in any way uses the website.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_3_INTRO: By using our website, you confirm that you are at least 16 years of age or have the consent of your parents or legal guardians. You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of third parties or restrict or inhibit their use and enjoyment of the website.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PROHIBITED_ACTION_1: Using the website in any way that may cause damage or affect its availability or accessibility.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PROHIBITED_ACTION_2: Using the website to transmit or upload any material containing viruses or unsolicited advertising or promotional material.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PROHIBITED_ACTION_3: Using the website to transmit or exchange material containing viruses, trojans, worms, time bombs, keystroke loggers, spyware, adware, or any other harmful code, file, or programs.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PROHIBITED_ACTION_4: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our website, the server where it is stored, or any connected server, computer, or database.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_4_INTRO: We own or license all intellectual property rights to our website and its content. These works are protected by copyright laws and treaties worldwide. All rights are reserved.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.YOU_MAY_1: Print or download extracts for personal use.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.YOU_MAY_2: Share content within your organization for reference.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.YOU_MAY_NOT_1: Modify printed or digital copies of any material.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.YOU_MAY_NOT_2: Use images, photos, video/audio sequences, or graphics separately from accompanying text.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.YOU_MAY_NOT_3: Use any part of the website's content for commercial purposes without obtaining a license from us or our licensors.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_5_INTRO: To the extent permitted by law, we exclude all conditions, warranties, representations, or other terms that may apply to the website or its content, whether express or implied.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.LIABILITY_EXCLUSIONS_INTRO: We will not be liable for any loss or damage (contractual, tortious, including negligence, breach of legal duty, or otherwise) arising from
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.LIABILITY_EXCLUSION_1: Use or inability to use the website.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.LIABILITY_EXCLUSION_2: Reliance on any content displayed on the website.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.LIABILITY_EXCLUSION_3: Viruses, distributed denial-of-service attacks, or other harmful material due to your use of the website or downloading its content (or from any linked third-party sites).
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_6_INTRO: You may link to our homepage fairly and legally, provided it does not damage our reputation or imply false association, approval, or endorsement.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.LINKING_RESTRICTION_1: Link in a way that suggests partnership or endorsement where none exists.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.LINKING_RESTRICTION_2: Link from a website you do not own.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.LINKING_RESTRICTION_3: Frame our website on another site or link to any page other than the homepage.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.LINKING_PERMISSION_NOTICE: We reserve the right to withdraw linking permission without notice.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_7_CONTENT: Links to third-party websites are provided for information only. We have no control over their content and accept no liability for them or any loss arising from their use.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_8_CONTENT_1: Any personal data collected will be processed in accordance with our
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_9_CONTENT: These Terms and Conditions are governed by French law. You and we agree to the exclusive jurisdiction of French courts.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.SECTION_10_CONTENT: We may update these Terms and Conditions by amending this page. Check this page periodically, as changes are binding.

GDPR_RIGHTS.TITLE: GDPR Rights
GDPR_RIGHTS.INTRO_TEXT: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights regarding your personal data processed by Synopp. To exercise any of these rights, contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO) at
GDPR_RIGHTS.ACCESS_POINT_1: Confirmation that we process your data.
GDPR_RIGHTS.ACCESS_POINT_2: A copy of your personal data in a readable format.
GDPR_RIGHTS.ACCESS_POINT_3: Details about the purpose, categories, and recipients of your data.
GDPR_RIGHTS.ACCESS_RESPONSE_TIME: We'll respond within 1 month (extendable to 3 months for complex requests).
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_2_CONTENT: Request corrections if your data is inaccurate or incomplete.
GDPR_RIGHTS.ERASURE_EXCEPTIONS: Exceptions: We retain data if required by French law (e.g., fiscal records under
GDPR_RIGHTS.FRENCH_COMMERCIAL_CODE: Article L 123-22 of the French Commercial Code
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_4_INTRO: Ask us to temporarily restrict processing if
GDPR_RIGHTS.RESTRICT_POINT_2: Processing is unlawful but you oppose erasure.
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_5_CONTENT: Request your data in a structured, commonly used format (e.g., JSON, CSV) for transfer to another provider.
GDPR_RIGHTS.DIRECT_MARKETING_CONTENT: Unsubscribe via any marketing email or object via
GDPR_RIGHTS.LEGITIMATE_INTERESTS_CONTENT: We'll cease unless we demonstrate compelling legal grounds.
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_7_CONTENT: Synopp does not use fully automated decision-making that significantly affects users.
GDPR_RIGHTS.SECTION_8_CONTENT: Withdraw consent anytime (e.g., newsletters). This does not affect prior lawful processing.
GDPR_RIGHTS.EMAIL_REQUIREMENT_1: Full name + proof of identity (e.g., redacted ID).
GDPR_RIGHTS.RESPONSE_TIME_CONTENT: 1 month (may extend to 3 months with notification).
GDPR_RIGHTS.NO_FEES_CONTENT: Free unless requests are manifestly unfounded or excessive.
GDPR_RIGHTS.COMPLAINTS_INTRO: If unsatisfied, lodge a complaint with
GDPR_RIGHTS.POST_NOTE: Note: For requests by post, we recommend using tracked mail.
